pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Oak Ent Tree.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)N/A$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 18-24 $(item)Oak Logs$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Oak Leaves$() or 1-4 $(item)Oak Saplings$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Red Mushrooms$() or 1-4 $(item)Brown Mushrooms$(), 85%% chance of 1-2 $(item)Diamonds$().

pages.title: Description
pages.text: An ancient like creature made of wood and mushrooms, The Oak Ent is a massive creature that stands taller than most mobs in the world, as well as bulkier and stronger than most.
